DOC.brief_summary: This study conducted to assess the effects of normal saline or cefazolin irrigation on the incidence of SSIs. Hypothesis: Normal saline or cefazolin irrigation decreases the incidence of SSIs.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Cefazolin and Normal Saline Irrigation on Surgical Site Infections (SSIs)
DOC.detailed_description: All pregnant women who underwent cesarean after 6 hours passed their rupture of membrane and attended to Shariati Hospital of Bandarabbass were eligible for our study.
DOC.criteria: pregnant women 6 hours passed their rupture of membrane needed to undergo cesarean allergy to penicillin allergy to cefazolin history of immunosuppressive drug use gestational diabetes mellitus preeclampsia
